name: 劉宛育
objective: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.
schedule:
Week 01: Introduction
Week 02: Interior design
Week 03: Form & Function & Structure
Week 04: Construction & Materiality
Week 05: Representations I
Week 06: Representations II
Week 07: Representations III
Week 08: Exterior design
Week 09: Mid-term
Week 10: Exterior design II
Week 11: Strategies: diagram
Week 12: Strategies: diagram II
Week 13: Strategies: computation
Week 14: Strategies: parameters
Week 15: Strategies: parameters II
Week 16: Strategies: parameters III
Week 17: Conclusion
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 20%
Mid-term report: 25%
Homework: twice, each one 15% (15% x2= 30%)
Final report: 25%
